name: The Mystery of the Clocks
description:
The first-person journey through a dark maze with a haunting curse enshrouding intriguing clocks. Make your way through this mystery by solving the clue word utilizing the clocks. Help is always available to those who just ask.

Produced for the Cebu Game Dev "Horror Jam 2019".

Navigation:

  • Mouse = look around
  • WASD = movement
  • Q & E = interact with clock
  • Esc = pause, options menu
  • ?

Note: Use the pause options menu to adjust the exposure if the scene renders too dark on your monitor.

Also, this is a game-jam game... so there may be bugs!
